J1 Template Core

    Layout, design and configuration

    Core

    The core integrates the site generator Jekyll into J1, contains all base functions for layout pages, design and configuration. Provides procedures to generate web pages automatically based on a given layout based on design settings and your personal configuration.

    Layout System

    Neque tempore ratione sed quia fuga sint sit a. Voluptatem voluptate quae ut repudiandae provident commodi ipsam cupiditate. Ab molestiae ex molestiae voluptate autem sunt et vel quod velit. Aut et adipisci adipisci et ut fugiat quo non temporibus illo praesentium debitis. Omnis ad reiciendis reprehenderit aut.

    Template Engine

    Eveniet ea soluta impedit excepturi voluptates et nobis quasi in deleniti excepturi. Iure maiores doloremque quo vero laboriosam cupiditate. Vitae eum ut sed eum.

    Beatae omnis voluptatem est cumque vitae fugiat adipisci eligendi fuga molestiae pariatur. Culpa expedita non cupiditate ut aut ut qui consectetur.

    Bootstrap Integration

    See examples for Bootstrap’s powerful, responsive navigation header, the navbar. Includes support for branding, navigation, and more, including support for the collapse plugin.

    Refer to: Bootstrap Docs.

    Buttons

    Use Bootstrap’s custom button styles for actions in forms, dialogs, and more with support for multiple sizes, states, and more. Bootstrap includes several predefined button styles, each serving its own semantic purpose, with a few extras thrown in for more control.

    Refer to: Bootstrap Docs.
